DOC.brief_summary: The major element survey sampling , questionnaire design , field survey database construction . This survey incorporate multistage stratify sample scheme . Questionnaires include health status , utilization health care , health behavior , quality life , social economic status .
DOC.detailed_description: This survey take representative sample county municipality Taiwan use stratify multi-stage systematic sampling procedure . Within county/municipality ( stratum ) , sample select probability proportional population size . Questionnaire design base need Department Health Welfare public health professional . Due different age different health problem , questionnaire divide 3 part : 12 , 23-64 , 65+ year . The response rate 75 % 2013 .
DOC.criteria: All select sample interview . severely ill frail answer ; cognitive problem ; hear speaking problem ; dementia .
